articles.description: "I'm an embalmer. People assume we're creepy or morbid, but families do appreciate and understand the care we take with their loved one, which makes it all worth it."
articles.content: "Second, CPS doesn't get a bonus for every child they bring into custody. Believe me, they do not get paid enough to do their job as it is, let alone any bonuses. And where would this money come from… [+727 chars]
